name: cameron baby cardigan
notes:
this is a very sweet little baby cardigan - knitted from the top down, and with just 2 small sleeves to join

a fully buttoned front, 

and long or short sleeves - you choose

a lovely gender-neutral design. 


requires:
around   80g of dk (8ply) yarn for the long-sleeved version
around   75g of dk (8ply) yarn for the short-sleeved version
4mm needles
6 buttons

so cute.


**to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below
